TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ValueChangedEventHandler(object sender, ValueChangedEventArgs pinValueChangedEventArgs);
.class public auto ansi sealed ValueChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ValueChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, pinValueChangedEventArgs As ValueChangedEventArgs)
type ValueChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ValueChangedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: The pin value changed arguments from the event.
Docs.summary: Delegate that defines the structure for callbacks when the value of a measurement (i.e. analog input) changes.
